pages.text: The $(mob)Spriggan$() is a monster that spawns in the Forests of the $(thing)Overworld$() at night. It stealthily waits for players to approach it before attacking, benefitting from an $(thing)Invisibility$() effect until a player comes within 6 blocks of it. It is vulnerable to Fire and axes. While in water, $(mob)Spriggans$() gain $(thing)Resistance$() and regenerate 10% of their health every 5 seconds.
$(mob)Spriggans$() drop $(item)Taproot$() on death, which can be eaten to clear all negative potion effects on a player.
$(mob)Spriggans$() rarely drop $(item)Book of Nature$() on death, which is a magical ranged weapon that fires projectiles which inflict $(thing)Poison$() on hit.
